p.k: Christine (Corinne Touzet), a dermatologist falls in love with Bruno (Francis Renaud), a 40-year-old comic strip writer, but she lies about her age. She’s not 42; she’s 50. The affair gets complicated when Bruno tells her that he wants a child. Stuck in her lie, Christine aims to tell the truth during a family reunion, which will take a disastrous turn.
